description: Study TipKit sample code for macOS app development patterns
steps: Read README and understand sample structure
Analyze app architecture and TipKit integration
Study different tip display patterns (inline, popover, actions)
Review rule composition and event donation patterns
Document findings in LEARNINGS.md and OpenCode-SWIFTDB.md

description: Document valuable insights from TipKit sample analysis
steps: Include code snippets and references to sample code
Organize by topic: architecture, patterns, best practices

description: Ensure project builds and documentation is accurate
steps: Check markdown formatting in documentation files
